snippet: The teacher, Rafael Sosa of Public School 208, is at least the 10th public-school employee to be arrested this year on sexual offenses involving students.
abstract: The teacher, Rafael Sosa of Public School 208, is at least the 10th public-school employee to be arrested this year on sexual offenses involving students.

headline.main: Teacher Charged With Sexually Abusing 8-Year-Old Girl
headline.print_headline: City Teacher Is Charged With Abuse Of a Girl, 8
